document.full_text: bradley cooper is in early negotiations to star in a remake of "the crow," the 1994 film that gained cult status due in part to star brandon lee's on-set accidental on-set death.
document.title: bradley cooper in talks to star in "crow" remake
lines_and_colors: bradley cooper is in early negotiations to star in a remake of "the crow," the 1994 film that gained cult status due in part to star brandon lee's on-set accidental on-set death.
